creator: gcs@lsc.hu
text:
Some users like me reported stalls when a form is submitted (see tomcat-users
mailing list). The browser just waits, and waits, but when the time is out the
connection stops.
Regardless of the elements in the form, this bug may happen from time to time.
If you need more details, I will try my best to help you.

Please always attach all the details to the bug report. It should be as self
contained as possible.
creator: remm@apache.org
remm@apache.org
text:
The new HTTP/1.1 connector uses totally diffrent POST parameter parsing code.
This bug may not exist anymore. It may also be a connection handling bug on the
browser side. IE is not that great for example when it comes to connection handling.
